entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow this evening. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow changing to snow in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
